1.0.name: wordpress/wpsuperquiz
1.0.description: WPSuperQuiz offers you the opportunity to create a quiz from your normal blog posts. You write a post with one or more questions and your visitors can submit anwers via the comment function. Each submitted suggestion is checked for the correct solution. In case someone submitted the right answer, the winner will be named in the initial quiz post and a link to the correct comment is created. To keep the quiz exciting, all answers will be masked with asterisks (by default), which will be removed when the quiz has been finished.
